short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block unloading of a website without your explicit consent. Useful for testing site tracking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block unloading of a website without your explicit consent, when a link is clicked or a form is submitted. This behavior can be turned on by clicking on the extension icon, and this is valid for that given page. Must be re-enabled upon page reload as well. This functionality is useful for testing testing various page analytics functions, like click tracking, form tracking.
